rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0010
rows.name: An Ares...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0020
rows.name: I couldn't confirm who was piloting it,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0025
rows.name: but that was an Ares all right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0030
rows.name: The Prime, no less.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0040
rows.name: Lin. Give me your take.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0050
rows.name: Yes, sir.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0060
rows.name:
Judging by the speed, the maneuverability...
It's hard to imagine what else it could be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0070
rows.name: I think...we know the pilot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0080
rows.name: So, what—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0090
rows.name: are you telling me he's still alive?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: xs31080100_SEL0010
rows.name: Ask who "he" might be referring to.

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0100
rows.name: Alois Bernholt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0110
rows.name: Pilot of the first Ares, and the hero who saved us all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_JNK0020
rows.name: Admire

rows.label: xs31080100_SEL0020
rows.name: Enthuse that the pilot's skills were excellent.

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0120
rows.name: Alois Bernholt...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0130
rows.name: If he was flying it... Well, no wonder.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0140
rows.name: If I'm gold, he's diamond.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0150
rows.name: On that note, I've got some news for you too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0160
rows.name: ...But you're not gonna like it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0170
rows.name: Let's hear it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0180
rows.name: The Vita you all saw...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0190
rows.name: Unfortunately, it's the real deal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0200
rows.name: Wasn't it locked up in the Lifehold Core?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0210
rows.name: I looked into it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0220
rows.name:
It shoulda been safe inside.
But there wasn't so much as a fart.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0230
rows.name: Either one of those phenomena's to blame,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0240
rows.name: or God knows what.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0250
rows.name: An Ares, the Vita, chunks of the world vanishing...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0260
rows.name: I've had just about enough of this![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0270
rows.name: You forgot the Ghosts, Commander.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0280
rows.name: Ghosts...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0290
rows.name: These beings we know nothing about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0300
rows.name: Could someone please bring us up to velocity?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0310
rows.name: Sad to say, we don't know much ourselves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0320
rows.name:
An alien civilization opposed to the Ganglion...
...And yeah, that about covers it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0330
rows.name: They were certainly opposed, but—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0340
rows.name:
It felt like the Ghosts were mopping
the floor with them, and it wasn't even close.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0350
rows.name: They sent the Ganglion to pack?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0360
rows.name: Yep, it was pretty one-sided.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0370
rows.name: Ultimately,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0380
rows.name:
it was the battle between the Ghosts and
the Ganglion that cost us our world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0390
rows.name: We were the biggest losers in that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0400
rows.name: It's not quite that simple.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0410
rows.name: The Ghosts are an omen—harbingers of doom.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0420
rows.name:
Back then, when we watched the Ganglion and
Ghosts clash with one another...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0430
rows.name: Think. What happened?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0440
rows.name: That day,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0450
rows.name: Earth was destroyed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0460
rows.name: What's more—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0470
rows.name: that wasn't the first event of its kind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0480
rows.name: My home, the planet I was born on...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0490
rows.name: It met with the same fate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0500
rows.name: Your planet...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0510
rows.name: It was destroyed...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0520
rows.name: Mira disappearing...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0525
rows.name: The Ghosts' arrival...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0530
rows.name: Even the Ares...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0540
rows.name: The dots all join up. It's connected.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0550
rows.name: Elma—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0560
rows.name: It's fine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0570
rows.name: The time has come for you all to hear the truth...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0580
rows.name: of how I lost my home, twice over.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0590
rows.name: The planet of my birth...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0600
rows.name:
lay in a vastly distant corner of the universe,
and evolved differently from Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0610
rows.name:
But like Earth, it was home to descendants of
the ancient Samaarians.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0620
rows.name:
We didn't wage war against other worlds.
Ours was a peace-loving race.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0630
rows.name: Till the Ganglion struck...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0640
rows.name: without a whisper of warning.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0650
rows.name:
Their aim was nothing less than to completely
eradicate Samaar's legacy,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0660
rows.name: and furthermore...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0670
rows.name: to claim the Ares.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0680
rows.name: Huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0690
rows.name: The Ares?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0700
rows.name: How's the Ares come into all this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0710
rows.name: I don't know the whole story either.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0720
rows.name: Only...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0730
rows.name:
the Ares wasn't something we created ourselves.
It came from our forebears.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0740
rows.name: The technology was theirs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0750
rows.name:
All we did was recreate it based on records and
relics left behind by Ancient Samaar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0760
rows.name: But that means...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0770
rows.name: Right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0780
rows.name:
The Ganglion are an artificial lifeform
engineered by Samaar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0790
rows.name: And the Ares is one of Samaar's creations too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0800
rows.name: Which makes it easier to understand their motivations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0810
rows.name:
You think that's why the Vita was
pursuing the Ares then?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0820
rows.name:
However, we still have no inkling as to why
the Ghosts appeared.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0830
rows.name: I was just getting to that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0840
rows.name: As our fight against the Ganglion drew on,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0850
rows.name: neither side seemed to be gaining any ground.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0860
rows.name: Suddenly, dematerialization struck my homeworld.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0870
rows.name:
Then came a third side to the conflict—
one hostile to both.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0880
rows.name: Namely,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0890
rows.name: the Ghosts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0900
rows.name:
The threat was new and unexpected, and indiscriminate,
attacking us and Ganglion alike.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0910
rows.name: The fighting grew muddled...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0920
rows.name: and my world—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0930
rows.name: already brought to the brink by war—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0940
rows.name: was now also losing landmass to the de-mat events.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0950
rows.name: The fate of my planet was sealed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0960
rows.name: And so...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0970
rows.name: the Ares and I were sent with a mission to Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0980
rows.name:
If the Ganglion survived, they would target you next,
as our fellow descendants of Samaar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG0990
rows.name: The last remaining threat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1000
rows.name: As for me, I was to gift you Ares's tech,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1010
rows.name: spurring your science to hopefully level the playing field.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1020
rows.name: But in the end, I couldn't save the Earth,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1030
rows.name: nor the Ares or the hero...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_JNK0030
rows.name: Uplift

rows.label: xs31080100_SEL0030
rows.name:
Observe that, despite the odds,
you're still alive.

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1040
rows.name: That's right![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1050
rows.name: It may look grim...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1060
rows.name: but we wouldn't even be here if it weren't for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1070
rows.name: Exactly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1080
rows.name: Without you, Colonel, none of us would be here talking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1090
rows.name: ...Thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_JNK0040
rows.name: Doomsay

rows.label: xs31080100_SEL0040
rows.name: Bemoan Mira's inevitable plight.

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1100
rows.name: Yes, well. Elma's planet, Earth, and Mira...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1110
rows.name: The pieces are similar...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1120
rows.name: but the board is quite different.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1140
rows.name: Yeah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1150
rows.name:
Elma's tech's been a real blessing.
It gave us a way out, and it's taken us this far.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1160
rows.name: Indeed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1170
rows.name:
If it wasn't for you, Elma, humanity would have
shared Earth's fate on that lamentable day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1180
rows.name: That's about the size of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1190
rows.name: ...Thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1200
rows.name:
Anyway. That's everything I have to share
about me and the Ares.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1210
rows.name:
The Ares and the Ghosts...
They're indirectly linked through the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1220
rows.name: And whenever Ghosts appear...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1230
rows.name: planets die.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1240
rows.name:
You're saying that the Ares is the reason?
IT's the cause of all this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1250
rows.name:
So we're gonna lose Mira just like Earth...?
Like your world?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1260
rows.name: Yes. Most likely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1270
rows.name: So we know what we gotta do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1280
rows.name: Right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1290
rows.name:
We gotta get out there and find that Ares.
Bada-boom.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1300
rows.name: But wait...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1310
rows.name: Why didn't the pilot just get in contact with us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1320
rows.name: What's the point of hiding who they are?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1330
rows.name: Commander Vandham![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1340
rows.name: What is it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1350
rows.name: We've detected Skells in active combat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1360
rows.name: Two units.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1370
rows.name: They finally come up on FrontierNav, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1380
rows.name: ...This energy's unreal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1390
rows.name: Ain't your grandpappy's Skells.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1400
rows.name: You don't think—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1410
rows.name:
Top-order prediction would be
an Ares and the Vita.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1420
rows.name: That saves us some legwork.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1430
rows.name: Quite.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1440
rows.name: Let's move out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1450
rows.name: You might be facing the Vita.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1460
rows.name: I want you all out there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1470
rows.name: Yes, sir![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1480
rows.name: No need to pussyfoot around, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1490
rows.name: stay frosty, Elma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1500
rows.name: Roger.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1510
rows.name: Right now, the way forward is clear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs31080100_MSG1520
rows.name:
We don't know what's out there,
but solving that mystery is the only hope we have.[ST:wait ]
